author: Chris Strong
description: An after-dinner sipper of a cocktail with cognac and Irish whiskey stirred with rich orange and herbal liqueurs.
name: Parle-vous Irish cocktail
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
(Consider adding a chunk of ice to the glass

video.name: HOWTO make Parle-vous Irish cocktail
